name: Argenx SE
description: Argenx SE is a biotechnology company focused on developing and delivering innovative therapies for patients with severe autoimmune diseases and cancer. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Ghent, Belgium, Argenx leverages its proprietary immunology platform to discover and develop monoclonal antibodies that target the underlying mechanisms of disease. The company’s lead product, efgartigimod, is an immunoglobulin G (IgG) modulating therapy that has shown promising results in treating various autoimmune conditions, including myasthenia gravis. Argenx aims to improve the lives of patients through the development of transformative treatments that address unmet medical needs. With a robust pipeline, the company is also exploring applications in oncology and other diseases where modulation of the immune system can provide therapeutic benefit. Argenx is committed to scientific excellence and collaboration, partnering with leading organizations to accelerate its research and development efforts. The company is listed on the NASDAQ under the ticker symbol ARGX, symbolizing its commitment to innovation and growth in the biotech sector.
